strapiPost.title: High Speed Internet In Benton County
strapiPost.content:
A town hall meeting is taking place this Friday, Dec. 3 to discuss high speed internet in Benton County. 

  • To hear the people: Though Benton County is perceived to have high speed internet, there are areas that do not have the broadband coverage that others do. The meeting is taking place to hear from residents and find out where internet problems can be addressed. 
  • Individual contribution: A survey has been sent out for Benton County residents to fill out so advancements can be made in the mission to make the area as technologically accessible as possible, as the internet is becoming a basic need.

Read the full KNWA story HERE.
